name: ASAN VERSE
description: ASAN VERSE is a metaverse for providing galleries, artists, dealers, and collectors with the information of art presentation, art trend, specialized knowledge, seminar, and community services. And ASAN NFT allows them to sell their art works in a variety of ways. In addition, ASAN TOKEN is used for trading art works, sponsoring new artists, and community activities managed by the ASAN VERSE Foundation.
